mdRecord.dcterms:title: War Time Military Documents
mdRecord.dcterms:description: War time military documents, October 8, 1861. Lists contents of soldiers pocket book and receipt to Capt. C. M. Stigleman for payment made to Private Isaac P. Livesay Co. A. 24th VA Infantry. Note: Isaac P. Linesay died of typhoid fever. 2 original pieces, and 1 typed transcription page.
mdRecord.dcterms:subject: Soldiers
United States
Correspondence
mdRecord.dcterms:provenance: Virginia Polytechnic Institute and State University. University Libraries
